entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 09:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: 16 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries in onshore winds. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:49 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 08:49 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
